name: Basic Beat
description:
This is my entry for the Rhythm Jam 2021. Hit the notes with the D/F/J/K keys (you know the drill).

In the end I couldn't implement everything I wanted but the game jam was great motivator, thanks for hosting it! This was my first game jam.

Music is "Galaxies" by Jens East (licensed under Creative Commons 4.0). Unfortunately I didn't have time to chart the whole song but check it out, it's great!

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Jens_East_ft_Henk/Galaxies_1229/Jens_East_-_G...
